controls.name: blockIndex
controls.caption: First block index of input array, 0..N-1 (N is the number of blocks in input)

controls.name: blockIndexInReplacer
controls.caption: First block index of replace_with array, 0..M-1 (M is the number of blocks in replace_with)

controls.name: numberOfBlocks
controls.caption: Number of copied blocks; 0 is interpreted as M (number of blocks in replace_with)
